refnamediv.refpurpose: Applies a unwrapping operation to an array of phase values.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Applies a unwrapping operation to a vector of phases stored in an array. The output is an array with phases in the range of [-pi,pi).

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: kout[] -- output array containing the unwrapped phases. It will be created if it does not exist.
kin[] -- input array containing the input vector.
